src:
Atletikove muke s golovima
Ekipa Dijega Simeonea teško i retko dobija Sevilju na njenom terenu

02 Nov 2019

Atletiko Madrid dobio je samo polovinu utakmica na startu španske Primere. I dok je odbrana uobičajeno najbolji deo tima Dijega Simeonea (samo šets primljenih golova u prvih 11 kola), napad je izuzetno problematičan, glavni krivac što Jorgandžije nisu na prvom mestu. Madriđanima posebno škripi u gostima, gde su doživeli jedini poraz u ligi i protiv Valjadolida odigrali samo 0:0. A ovog vikenda sledi im jedno od najtežih gostovanja u sezoni – na Sančez Pishuanu.
Ni Sevilja nije značajno efikasnija od Atletika, postigla je tek tri gola više, ali je na tri od poslednja četiri meča zategla odbranu – mreža joj se nije zatresla. Taj segment biće vrlo važan u sudaru s Madriđanima.
Ekipa Dijega Simeonea teško i retko dobija Sevilju na njenom terenu. Prošle godine Atletiko je slavio s ubedljivih 5:2, međutim pre toga za čitavu deceniju samo dva trijumfa Jorgandžija. Na pet poslednjih susreta ovih rivala došlo je GG, u poslednja dva navrata uz 0-2, tri pre toga uz 3+.
Ono čega bi Atletiko trebalo posebno da se čuva jesu napadi Sevilje u poslednjih petnaestak minuta. Sa skoro 40 odsto golova u tom periodu momci sa Pishuana su bez premca u TOP 5 evropskih liga.



Luka Jović je pre nekoliko dana  konačno postigao prvenac u dresu Real Madrida. U prvom minutu nadoknade, nakon centaršuta Karvahala, mladi srpski napadač se sjajno uzdigao i udarcem glavom matirao golmana Leganjesa Sorijana. Jović se na terenu našao od 70. minuta, kada je zamenio Karima Benzemu, sačekao je pravi trenutak i konačno pogodio posle tri meseca čekanja. Da je imao malo više sreće, Jović je mogao i do drugog gola samo dva minuta kasnije, ali je njegov udarac iz neposredne blizine uspeo da zaustavi Sorijano. Bilo je to efikasno veče Real Madrida, kao stvoreno da bivši napadač Ajntrahta i Crvene zvezde konačno razbije tu nevidljivu barijeru i uspeo je. Ne samo da je postigao gol, već je prilikom postizanja pogotka pokazao svu napadačku raskoš, za šta je odlmah na terenu dobio pohvale od iskusnog Marsela.
 Real Madrid se nekako provlačio u prvih osam kola, sve dok nije otišao na Majorku i „tresnuo o ledinu“. Poraz od novog člana Primere ogolio je hrpu novih problema Kraljevskog kluba, ali kada se govori o tim problemima, oni se odnose na nemogućnost da Real u takvom stanju parira najboljim evropskim timovima – s osrednjim ekpama u Španiji ne bi smelo da bude problema.
U kakvom god stanju bila, četa Zinedina Zidana ne bi smela da se pribojava duela s Betisom, ekipom koja ima najlošiju odbranu u ligi i sva je prilika, boriće se za opstanak.
Ono što bi trebalo da predstavlja dodatni motiv za Real svakako su dva poslednja duela sa Betisom na Santijago Bernabeu. Zeleno-beli su slavili u oba navrata bez primljenog gola – 2:0 i 1:0. Takođe, za četiri poslednje sezone samo jedna pobeda domaćina u okršajima ovih klubova...
Ali tradicije su tu da se ruše. Madriđani, u kakvoj god formi bili, kvalitetom su daleko iznad Betisa i sve osim ubedljive pobede predstavljalo bi iznenađenje. A lagane pobede Reala nad Betisom poslednjih godina (doduše uglavnom na strani) uobičajene su: 5:0, 6:1, 5:3.

text:
Athletic goals with goals
Diego Simeone's team hardly and rarely gets Sevilla on her court

02 Nov 2019

Atletico Madrid won only half of the matches at the start of the Spanish Primera. While defense is usually the best part of Diego Simeone's team (only six goals scored in the first 11 rounds), the offense is extremely problematic, the main culprit is that the Georgians are not in the first place. The Madrid screams especially away, where they suffered their only defeat in the league and only played 0-0 against Valladolid. And this weekend follows one of the toughest away appearances of the season - at Sanchez Pishuan.
Not even Seville is significantly more efficient than Athletic, she has scored only three goals more, but has tightened her defense in three of her last four matches - her net has not shaken. That segment will be very important in the collision with the Madrid people.
Diego Simeone's team hardly and rarely gets Sevilla on her court. Last year Atletico celebrated with a convincing 5: 2, but before that for the whole decade only two triumphs of Jorgiani. In the last five meetings of these rivals GG came, on the last two occasions 0-2, three before that with 3+.
What Atletico should be especially careful about are Sevilla's last fifteen minutes. With almost 40 per cent of goals scored during this period, the Pishuana boys are unrivaled in the TOP 5 European leagues.



A few days ago, Luka Jovic finally made his Real Madrid jersey debut. In the first minute of play, after the Karvahal midfielder, the young Serbian striker rose sharply and hit his goalkeeper Leganes Sorijan with a header. Jovic has been on the field since the 70th minute when he replaced Karim Benzema, waited for the right moment and finally hit after three months of waiting. Had he been a little lucky, Jovic could have reached the second goal just two minutes later, but his shot from close range managed to stop Soriano. It was an effective Real Madrid night, as if the former striker of Eintracht and Red Star had finally broken that invisible barrier and succeeded. Not only did he score, but he showed all the attacking splendor of the goal, for which he immediately received praise from the experienced Marseille on the field.
Real Madrid somehow made it through the first eight rounds until it went to Majorca and "crashed against the ice." The defeat of a new member of Primera has exposed a bunch of new problems for the Royal Club, but when it comes to these problems, they refer to the inability of Real to compete with the best European teams in such a state - with mediocre teams in Spain there should be no problem.
Whatever the situation, Zinedine Zidan's company should not be afraid of a duel with Betis, the team that has the worst defense in the league and is a good fit for survival.
What should be an additional motive for Real are certainly the last two duels with Betis at the Santiago Bernabeu. The Green and White celebrated on both occasions without a goal - 2-0 and 1-0. Also, for the last four seasons, only one home win at the clash of these clubs ...
But the traditions are there to break. Whatever the form, the Madrid players are far beyond Betis in quality and anything but a convincing victory would come as a surprise. And Real's slight victories over Betis in recent years (admittedly mostly on the sidelines) are common: 5: 0, 6: 1, 5: 3.
